header.name: Febe Huang
header.title: Frontend Engineer / Full-Stack Developer
header.greeting: Hi, I'm Febe, a junior frontend developer specializing in Vue.js and Nuxt.I focus on building high-performance, user-friendly web applications with clean structure and smooth interactions.With experience in frontend and backend integration, I am passionate about improving user experience and continuously refining my technical skills.

sections.technical_skills_desc: Core technologies I use regularly in development.
sections.get_in_touch_desc: Feel free to reach out to me through the following platforms

skills.frontend_desc: Experienced in building responsive and interactive user interfaces using modern frontend frameworks and styling tools.
skills.backend_desc: Capable of building APIs, handling server-side logic, and managing databases.

experience.desc_1: Worked on converting UI designs into Vue components and building responsive layouts. Collaborated with designers and backend developers to integrate APIs and improve overall user experience using TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.
experience.desc_2: Developed frontend interfaces using Vue.js and SCSS, and integrated them with RESTful APIs for dynamic data display. Participated in the development of company websites and internal systems.

projects.project_1_desc: A travel information website focused on New Zealand tourism, providing destination highlights and travel planning features.Built with Nuxt 3 and Tailwind CSS, and enhanced with GSAP animations to create smooth and engaging user interactions.The project supports SEO optimization, dynamic routing, and multilingual architecture.
projects.project_2_desc: A full-stack web application integrating garbage classification and location-based search.The backend is built with Node.js and Express, using MongoDB as the database, and integrated with the Google Maps API for location services.The frontend handles UI design, API integration, and full CRUD functionality.

about.title: Junior Frontend Engineer
about.school: National Taichung University of Science and Technology ï½œ Graduated:  2020
about.des: I am a passionate frontend developer with hands-on experience in Vue and Nuxt for building dynamic web applications.I value clean code, maintainable architecture, and efficient collaboration.My goal is to continuously improve my technical skills through real-world projects and contribute to meaningful products.
